a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Global damage costs from natural disasters, 1980 to 2022
Total economic cost of damages as a result of global natural disasters in any given year, measured in current US$.
Includes those from drought, floods, extreme weather, extreme temperature, landslides, dry mass movements,
Data source: EM-DAT, CRED / Universit√© catholique de Louvain, Brussels (Belgium)
